评论概述: Great value, size is slightly full
评论详情: Beautiful garment, as advertised. Size is full, and I had to send first order back. No problem, and instant replacement.

This sweater, seems to fit pretty good. Yeah, I might need to suck it in just a little so my gut doesn't reveal itself too much, but it was true to size for me. I like the style and the way it looks on me - it feels both nice and casual. I'm not crazy about the 98% polyester making it feel kind of "spongy". But it's lightweight and looks nice. I'm sure I'll wear it often this fall.

评论概述: Works even for a bigger guy
评论详情: First of all the stitch pattern on this is really nicely made. There we a couple of loose threads but nothing that unraveled the sweater and the weaving was nice enough to not let a breeze through while not being so heavy as to be unwearable in fall.  The zipper is really nicely constructed. I was expecting with as soft as the sweater was that the zipper would give me trouble but it actually didnt and was really easy to zip or unzip. I have a super long torso so I have to wear this with an undershirt or something tucked into jeans but other than that I really really like this sweater!

My husband usually wears a 2x and I was praying this would fit. As with most clothes we get on Amazon, it runs small. He would absolutely need a 3x in this. The quality is gorgeous and the sweater is beautiful, I wish it was bigger.

I like the look and feel of this quarter zip. I usually wear it with a dress shirt underneath and I can wear it to work. It doesn't wrinkle too easily and it wears neatly. I often like to roll the sleeves up on my shirts, and this works perfectly in that scenario. Overall, if you like the style of the shirt - you should go for it!

I really like this sweater. It is nice and thick, very warm, and extremely comfortable. It is a relaxed fit and the fabric is not restricting at all. I will be wearing this alot during fall and winter.
Good fit and appearance with nice lighter weight fabric. Neutral color makes it easy to wear with almost any color slacks.

This is a pretty nice sweater with a zipper v-neck. I'm not sure what it's made of, but it smells pretty bad out of the packaging (it was vacuum packed). Should be solvable by throwing it in the wash. I didn't care for the brown fixture on the zipper. Would prefer black to match the sweater. But obviously everyone has their own taste. If this sweater looks good to you, I think you'll enjoy it.

评论概述: A stylish men quarter zip pullover knit sweater for the fall and winter
评论详情: First, this sweater is true to size and is slim fit.  Second, the knit patent is stylish.  Third, the material is thick and soft.  Lastly, the quarter zip allows the collar to close all the way to the top so it will keep wind out during he cold weather.  I highly recommend it.

评论概述: Attractive and reasonably comfortable given the material
评论详情: I had a chance to wear this right away thanks to a turn in the weather and it kept me warm without feeling overheated. The acrylic composition is pretty standard fare, but keeps the cost low while maintaining a decent level of comfort. Construction is solid without any loose threads or gaps in the seams. The fit was true to size (medium) and I found the design with the angled knit pattern appealing and perfect for attire in a casual work environment. The care instructions do say NOT to tumble dry, so be aware of that if you want to keep it in your wardrobe for awhile.
I like the look and feel of this sweater. It's warm, comfortable and fits as listed in terms of size. I like the quarter zip and it goes with a variety of outfits from casual to more dressy.

The PAUL JONES Mens Quarter Zip Pullover Sweater fits as expected.  I find it warm and comfortable for the cool nights we are having.  I am more interested in the comfort and warmth than in fashion.  This provides what I am looking for.

This sweater looks nice and stylish. It is made of polyester, one of the most popular and cheapest type of materials on the market, and polyamide. Both are synthetic. It has a knit pattern and ribbed texture, making it feel thicker. The design is simple but elegant and relaxed.  I never pay much attention to my attire. During the 29+ years doing electrical engineering work, I wore a suit for the first three or four days, and never wore a suit again until I retired. A few years after that, following the advice of my boss, I did wear a tie just long enough to present something really important to the customers. One time, while shooting the breeze with a friend in the hallway, another friend walked by and with a friendly voice, he exclaimed, “there is no difference between you and the janitors!” I was wearing an old collarless T-shirt and a worn-out pair of jeans. I did not offend or bother me whatsoever, so I just laughed it off. Another time, during lunch time, while standing in front of my cubicle, a co-worker passed by and with a friendly voice, he pointed to my grey T-shirt and said “this is the ugliest shirt I have ever seen!” I did not offend or bother me at all, so I just laughed it off. A female co-worker came out of her cubicle and repeatedly demanded him to apologize. Another time, the senior manager came to a meeting. He greeted several people sitting on my left while looking them in the eyes. When he got to me, he said hello while staring at my chest. I wondered what caught his eyes, so I looked down and saw two peppercorn-sized holes and a coffee stain on my T-shirt. I never used that T-shirt anymore after that day.  To make a long story short, I am no fashion expert. I never pay much attention to clothing. All I know is this sweater looks nice. It is comfortable to wear and looks darn good on me, so it gets a 5-star rating.
Very nice

This is a nice looking sweater, and a great value. I ordered this for my son, so I’m not positive on the fit, but can tell by looking at it that it will fit him well! It’s very soft, and the neck/collar is sturdy so it hangs well. I worry about the material holding up in the wash over time, and it does say not to put it in the dryer. I marked it down because I don’t consider the color dark green. It’s more of a blue/green or dark teal, so I’m disappointed in the color. The zipper is a great quality, and very sturdy and looks nice in the sweater.

评论概述: Nice sweater, but got the wrong size
评论详情: I ordered an XXL but got a S when it arrived.  Major bummer because it looks nice and feels soft.  My only complaint is that the pattern on the front doesn't extend all the way around the back and stops on the side.

It’s a little hard to review a sweater in August – even in Wisconsin. The product is itself looks great. Nice style and fits well. I really like the Green color. It is well made. No threads or gaps. Sizing is accurate. I am 5’10 180 lbs an usually buy a large in a sweater/shirt. I am not sure why they say this is “Slim Fit” as I am definitely not slim and this fit nicely. I would classify it more a regular. It has a very nice soft, cozy feel to it.  We did have few days of 50-60 degree temperatures and I wore it and it was very comfortable. It will get a lot of wear this winter and will work well for travel.

Perfect fit in large. Got it in green. A little Christmas-y but I never wear green, and my wife says I always were the same colors. I really like the pattern and alternating texture. It's quite comfortable and breathable. Fabric is stretchy and it retains its shape.

I've had the opportunity to wear this a few times now and it checks all of the boxes for me. It looks great, feels great, it is warm, it is incredibly soft. True to size. This will be a fav I can already tell.
Really like this sweater.  L size fit my 5'7", 190# frame perfectly.  Fabric is soft and super comfortable and looks great.  This is a great deal and I will probably buy another one.

This is a very nice looking pull over sweater. The 95% polyester blend is very soft and of good quality. This fits me just right. I am 165 pounds and 5 foot nine. Dark blue will work well with the white variety of pants. Five stars!
love the look of this and good quality materials. cannot wait for it to get colder so i can wear it since it DOES keep you very warm,

评论概述: Stylish and Cozy: PJ PAUL JONES Men's Quarter Zip Pullover Sweater
评论详情: This sweater is a fantastic addition to any wardrobe, combining style, comfort, and versatility at an affordable price of $29.99. With a variety of colors to choose from, including classic black, coffee, dark blue, dark green, and dark grey, there's an option to suit every taste.  Made from a blend of 95% polyester and 5% polyamide, this sweater offers a soft, comfortable feel with just the right amount of elasticity. It's skin-friendly and durable, ensuring you stay warm and cozy during the colder months. The fabric is also machine washable, making it easy to care for and maintain.  The basic design features long sleeves, a quarter zip, and a classic twill texture. The ribbed neckline, sleeve cuffs, and hemline add a touch of sophistication, while the simple design exudes maturity and stability. This sweater is perfect for various occasions, whether worn alone for a casual yet stylish look or layered under a coat for added warmth and comfort.  Versatility is one of the standout features of this pullover. It's suitable for spring, fall, and winter, making it a great choice for daily wear, vacations, office work, business meetings, interviews, dates, dinners, and more. It also makes an excellent gift for the men in your life, be it your father, husband, brother, son, boyfriend, or male friend.  Before purchasing, it's important to consult the size chart provided by PJ PAUL JONES (not the one on Amazon) to ensure you get the right fit. And if you encounter any issues, their customer service is ready to help.  In summary, the PJ PAUL JONES Men's Quarter Zip Pullover Sweater offers a great blend of style, comfort, and functionality. It's a versatile piece that can easily elevate your wardrobe and keep you warm and stylish throughout the seasons. With a 30% coupon available, it's an excellent deal you don't want to miss!
